text: Lee Yoo-Hyung (January 21, 1911 - January 29, 2003) was a South Korean professional athlete. He is best known as an association football player. He was a member of the Japan national team in 1940.JapanNationalFootballTeam.com, 李 裕ネ瑩; retrieved 2012-9-6. ==International career statistics== |- |1940||1||0 |- !Total||1||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * * Japan Football Association Category:1911 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Japanese footballers Category:South Korean footballers Category:South Korean football managers Category:Japan international footballers
